title: Looking for players
body:
Hey everyone! IGN (Dragonrend) 

Im looking for players that are active from Thursdays to Sundays and want to play some ranked team games. it would be great if you have Skype. The team is a fun team that will take games seriously and want to strive for gold and learn to become a team and get the ranked team ward.

Roles that are available

- Top
- Jungle
- Mid
- Adc
- 3 subs  

I am looking forward to meeting new people and making new friends. See you on the rift!

replies.body:
thank you everyone for the great responses but im sorry to say that the ranked team is now full so i will not be accepting any more application. i hope to see everyone on the Rift!

Good Day
Dragonrend

Hi, I play all roles quite sufficiently but mid and jungle is my best. I play all meta champions and believe I would be valuable to your team.
My IGN is Suroh and Im platinum three. I do also have skype.

thanks everyone for the replies. J4ym4n64  and Schmiddy  i will add you once i get on league today. we can talk about details then.  NyEseth thank you for the detailed response i will add you and we can talk about what roles u want. thanks everyone for the support. 

I will see everyone on the rift!

Hey, I'm interested in this. I do have another ranked team with my friends, but we don't play ranked often (as a team) I've only recently climbed to Silver V in solo que, so I'm not the best player out there.

IGN: Nyeseth

I can really play anywhere you need me to (my worst lane is probably jungle, I'm a decent Rammus though).
Top - Comfortable as Gnar
Mid - Comfortable as Malzahar, Vel'Koz and Xerath
Jungle - Comfortable as Rammus, Vi and Diana (although Diana is proabably not my most preferred jungler)
ADC - Comfortable as Jinx, Caitlyn and Ashe
Support - Comfortable as Leona, Blitz, Soraka and Nami

At the moment I'm working on learning Fiora and Vayne.

I am interested i mainly play bot and adc so please add me
i also have skype, teamspeak and im currently unranked
ok Schmiddy add me in game and we can talk about the details. my IGN is Dragonrend
I am interested but i only started playing this year and am not currently ranked

thank you blue zekrom and Hashashin i have added both of you in game and we can about the details there.

Hope more people notice this and post. 

Have a nice day!

Hey Ign Hashashin currently in low silver but used to be gold earlier in the season, my 3 strongest roles would probably be mid, top , adc though im confident with sup and if i have to. Im pretty active and am able to get any application for voice chat add me if interested.
I can join the team pref roles are jg and adc but i cal phill. i cant w8 to make some g8 memes.
